mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `transactions` ( `ID` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Date` date NOT NULL, `Source` char(17) NOT NULL, `Destination` char(17) NOT NULL, `Destination_Type` int NOT NULL, `Transaction_Value` decimal(17,4) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), UNIQUE KEY `ID_UNIQUE` (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
mapper.select: SELECT Date, Source, Destination, Destination_Type, Transaction_Value FROM transactions WHERE DATE BETWEEN #{Start} AND #{End} AND Source=#{Source} ORDER BY ID ASC
SELECT Date, Source, Destination, Destination_Type, Transaction_Value FROM transactions WHERE DATE BETWEEN #{Start} AND #{End} AND Destination=#{Destination} ORDER BY ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (Date, Source, Destination, Destination_Type, Transaction_Value) VALUES (#{Date}, #{Source}, #{Destination}, #{Destination_Type}, #{Transaction_Value})
